name: Unclear Requirements
summary: Ticket has vague or conflicting requirements

scenarioTemplate.setup: You pick up your next ticket: '{ticketTitle}'. Reading through it, you notice {ambiguity}. The ticket was written by {pm}.

responseOptions.label: Just start building
responseOptions.description: I'll interpret it how I think makes sense and start coding.
responseOptions.evaluationNotes: Risk of building the wrong thing and wasted effort

responseOptions.label: Wait for clarification
responseOptions.description: I'll wait until someone clarifies what this means.

responseOptions.label: Ask specific questions
responseOptions.description: Message PM with specific questions about scope, success criteria, and priority

responseOptions.label: Propose your interpretation
responseOptions.description: Share your understanding: 'I'm interpreting this as X, Y, Z - does that match your intent?'
responseOptions.evaluationNotes: Shows initiative and moves conversation forward

responseOptions.label: Request quick sync
responseOptions.description: This needs discussion - can we do a 15-min refinement call?

evaluationCriteria.question: Did they take initiative to clarify?
Did they ask clear, specific questions?
Did they identify what was unclear?
Did they handle the ambiguity constructively?

followUpTemplates.message: Great questions! Let me clarify: the main goal is [specific goal]. For scope, let's focus on [specific scope]. Does that help?
That's close! Your points 1 and 2 are spot on. For point 3, we actually want [correction]. Want me to update the ticket with these details?
Good idea - this needs more discussion. I'm free at 2pm today. I'll also pull in [stakeholder] since they had input on this.
[After they submit PR] Hey, this looks good but it's not quite what we needed. The goal was actually [different goal]. Can we chat about adjustments?
